fever.title: Fever
fever.description: Fever is usually caused by viral or bacterial infection. Drink fluids, rest, and use paracetamol/ibuprofen for discomfort.
fever.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if fever lasts >3 days, above 39.4°C, or accompanied by rash, confusion, severe headache or breathing problems.

headache.title: Headache
headache.description: Caused by tension, dehydration, stress, eye strain, or migraine. Rest, hydration, and OTC pain relievers help.
headache.when_to_seek_care: Seek urgent care for sudden severe headache, after injury, or with confusion, fever, weakness, or vision change.

common_cold.title: Common Cold
common_cold.description: Viral infection of the upper respiratory tract. Rest, fluids, steam inhalation relieve symptoms.
common_cold.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if symptoms last >10 days or worsen.

flu.title: Flu (Influenza)
flu.description: Flu is a viral illness causing high fever, body pain and fatigue. Rest and hydration are essential.
flu.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if breathing difficulty, chest pain or persistent high fever occurs.

sore_throat.title: Sore Throat
sore_throat.description: Often viral but sometimes bacterial (strep throat). Warm liquids, lozenges help.
sore_throat.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if severe pain, fever above 38.5°C, or white patches appear.

ear_pain.title: Ear Pain
ear_pain.description: May be caused by infection or wax buildup.
ear_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for severe pain, discharge, bleeding, or fever.

sinus_infection.title: Sinus Infection
sinus_infection.description: Inflammation of sinus passages. Saline rinse, steam, fluids help.
sinus_infection.when_to_seek_care: Seek doctor if symptoms last >10 days.

asthma_attack.title: Asthma Attack
asthma_attack.description: Triggered by allergens, infections, exercise. Use rescue inhaler.
asthma_attack.when_to_seek_care: Seek emergency help if inhaler does not relieve symptoms.

allergic_reaction.title: Allergic Reaction
allergic_reaction.description: Triggered by allergens such as pollen or food. Antihistamines help.
allergic_reaction.when_to_seek_care: Seek emergency help for swelling of lips/tongue or difficulty breathing.

migraine.title: Migraine
migraine.description: Neurological condition causing severe headaches. Rest in dark room, hydration help.
migraine.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for new or worsening migraines.

stomach_pain.title: Stomach Pain
stomach_pain.description: Common causes include indigestion, gastritis, gas or infection.
stomach_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek help for severe pain, vomiting blood, or persistent symptoms.

food_poisoning.title: Food Poisoning
food_poisoning.description: Caused by contaminated food. Hydration is crucial.
food_poisoning.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for dehydration or blood in stool.

diarrhea.title: Diarrhea
diarrhea.description: Often due to infection or diet changes. ORS and fluids help.
diarrhea.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if lasting >3 days or severe dehydration occurs.

constipation.title: Constipation
constipation.description: Increase water, fiber intake and physical activity.
constipation.when_to_seek_care: Seek help if pain or bleeding occurs.

vomiting.title: Vomiting
vomiting.description: Caused by infection, food poisoning, motion sickness.
vomiting.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if vomiting persists >24 hours or contains blood.

heartburn.title: Heartburn (Acid Reflux)
heartburn.description: Avoid trigger foods, eat small meals, avoid lying down after eating.
heartburn.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for severe or frequent symptoms.

chest_pain.title: Chest Pain
chest_pain.description: Can be heart-related, lung-related, or acid reflux.
chest_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek emergency care immediately for any unexplained chest pain.

back_pain.title: Back Pain
back_pain.description: Usually due to strain or posture. Heat pads and stretching help.
back_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if weakness or numbness in legs occurs.

neck_pain.title: Neck Pain
neck_pain.description: Often from muscle strain or poor posture.
neck_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek help for severe pain or fever.

sprained_ankle.title: Sprained Ankle
sprained_ankle.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if cannot bear weight.

sprained_wrist.title: Sprained Wrist
sprained_wrist.description: Caused by twisting or falling on hand.
sprained_wrist.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if numbness or severe swelling occurs.

muscle_strain.title: Muscle Strain
muscle_strain.when_to_seek_care: Seek help for severe pain or swelling.

minor_burn.title: Minor Burn
minor_burn.description: Run under cool water 20 minutes. Do NOT apply ice.
minor_burn.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if large or deep.

rash.title: Skin Rash
rash.when_to_seek_care: Seek care if spreading rapidly or with fever.

acne.title: Acne
acne.description: Clean gently, avoid picking, use OTC creams.

gum_bleeding.title: Bleeding Gums
gum_bleeding.description: Often due to poor oral hygiene.

knee_pain.title: Knee Pain
knee_pain.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for locking or instability.

urinary_infection.title: Urinary Tract Infection
urinary_infection.description: Caused by bacteria. Drink plenty of water.
urinary_infection.when_to_seek_care: Seek care for fever or flank pain.

anxiety.title: Anxiety
anxiety.when_to_seek_care: Seek professional help if daily life is affected.
